Hi Richard,


What you did wrong is specified a specularity of 0 in your plasfunc:


>     void plasfunc myplastic
>     2 refl mybrdf.cal
>     0
>     4 1 1 1 0


The fourth argument is the fraction of reflected light that is modified 
by your specified BRDF.


-Greg
